participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

subjectkey.Description: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject

src_subject_id.Description: Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project

interview_date.Description: Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY

interview_age.Description: Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging. | Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

sex.Description: Sex of subject at birth | M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

eventname.Description: The event name for which the data was collected

ncog_device.Description: What was the make and model of the phone with technical issues? (e.g. iPhone 8, iPhone XR, Samsung Galaxy S10e, Pixel 3 XL, OnePlus 7T Pro, LG G8 ThinkQ, etc) | [ncog_session] = '2' or [ncog_session] = '3' or [ncog_session] = '5'

neurocog_2_device.Description: NCog Session: | 1=Completed in full without disruption ; 2=Completed in full with temporary technical disruption ; 3=Completed partially due to technical disruption ; 4=Completed partially due to not having a smart phone ; 5=Did not complete due to other technical issues [sched_delay] = '9'

Levels.2: Completed in full with temporary technical disruption
Levels.3: Completed partially due to technical disruption
Levels.4: Completed partially due to not having a smart phone
Levels.5: Did not complete due to other technical issues

neurocog_device.Description: NCog Session: | 1=Completed in full without disruption ; 2=Completed in full with temporary technical disruption ; 3=Completed partially due to technical disruption ; 4=Did not complete due to not being able to share screen ; 5=Did not complete due to technical issues [sched_delay] = '9'

Levels.2: Completed in full with temporary technical disruption
Levels.3: Completed partially due to technical disruption
Levels.4: Did not complete due to not being able to share screen
Levels.5: Did not complete due to technical issues

neurocog_2_lmt___1.Description: Method of LMT administration [Check all that apply]: 1, Audio | 1=Yes; 0=No [sched_hybrid] = '1'

neurocog_2_lmt___2.Description: Method of LMT administration [Check all that apply]:  2, Video/Webcam | 1=Yes; 0=No [sched_hybrid] = '1'

neurocog_2_lmt___3.Description: Method of LMT administration [Check all that apply]: 3, In person (ONLY if issues arise and hybrid) | 1=Yes; 0=No [sched_hybrid] = '1'

neurocog_2_god___1.Description: Method of GoD administration [Check all that apply]: 1, Audio | 1=Yes; 0=No [sched_hybrid] = '1'

neurocog_2_god___2.Description: Method of GoD administration [Check all that apply]:  2, Video/Webcam | 1=Yes; 0=No [sched_hybrid] = '1'

neurocog_2_god___3.Description: Method of GoD administration [Check all that apply]: 3, In person (ONLY if issues arise and hybrid) | 1=Yes; 0=No [sched_hybrid] = '1'

neurocog_2_flanker___1.Description: Method of Flanker administration [Check all that apply]: 1, Audio | 1=Yes; 0=No [sched_hybrid] = '1'

neurocog_2_flanker___2.Description: Method of Flanker administration [Check all that apply]:  2, Video/Webcam | 1=Yes; 0=No [sched_hybrid] = '1'

neurocog_2_flanker___3.Description: Method of Flanker administration [Check all that apply]: 3, In person (ONLY if issues arise and hybrid) | 1=Yes; 0=No [sched_hybrid] = '1'

neurocog_2_sit___1.Description: Method of SIT administration [Check all that apply]: 1, Audio | 1=Yes; 0=No [sched_hybrid] = '1'

neurocog_2_sit___2.Description: Method of SIT administration [Check all that apply]:  2, Video/Webcam | 1=Yes; 0=No [sched_hybrid] = '1'

neurocog_2_sit___3.Description: Method of SIT administration [Check all that apply]: 3, In person (ONLY if issues arise and hybrid) | 1=Yes; 0=No [sched_hybrid] = '1'

neurocog_2_ravlt___1.Description: Method of RAVLT administration [Check all that apply]: 1, Audio | 1=Yes; 0=No [sched_hybrid] = '1' and [event-name]!='4_year_follow_up_y_arm_1'

neurocog_2_ravlt___2.Description: Method of RAVLT administration [Check all that apply]:  2, Video/Webcam | 1=Yes; 0=No [sched_hybrid] = '1' and [event-name]!='4_year_follow_up_y_arm_1'

neurocog_2_ravlt___3.Description: Method of RAVLT administration [Check all that apply]: 3, In person (ONLY if issues arise and hybrid) | 1=Yes; 0=No [sched_hybrid] = '1' and [event-name]!='4_year_follow_up_y_arm_1'

neurocog_2_remote___1.Description: Remote method of Neurocognitive tasks pt 2 administration [Check all that apply]:  1, Audio | 1=Yes; 0=No  [sched_delay] = '9' AND [sched_hybrid] = '0'

neurocog_2_remote___2.Description: Remote method of Neurocognitive tasks pt 2 administration [Check all that apply]:  2, Video/Webcam | 1=Yes; 0=No  [sched_delay] = '9' AND [sched_hybrid] = '0'

neurocog_2_bird___1.Description: Method of BIRD administration [Check all that apply]: 1, Audio | 1=Yes; 0=No ([sched_delay] = '9' and [sched_hybrid] = '1') and [event-name] = '4_year_follow_up_y_arm_1'

neurocog_2_bird___2.Description: Method of BIRD administration [Check all that apply]:  2, Video/Webcam | 1=Yes; 0=No ([sched_delay] = '9' and [sched_hybrid] = '1') and [event-name] = '4_year_follow_up_y_arm_1'

neurocog_2_bird___3.Description: Method of BIRD administration [Check all that apply]: 3, In person (ONLY if issues arise and hybrid) | 1=Yes; 0=No ([sched_delay] = '9' and [sched_hybrid] = '1') and [event-name] = '4_year_follow_up_y_arm_1'

neurocog_card___1.Description: Method of  Dimensional Change Card Sort administration [Check all that apply]: 1, Audio | 1=Yes; 0=No ([sched_delay] = '9' and [sched_hybrid] = '1') AND ([event-name] != '4_year_follow_up_y_arm_1')

neurocog_card___2.Description: Method of  Dimensional Change Card Sort administration [Check all that apply]: 2, Video/Webcam | 1=Yes; 0=No ([sched_delay] = '9' and [sched_hybrid] = '1') AND ([event-name] != '4_year_follow_up_y_arm_1')

neurocog_card___3.Description: Method of  Dimensional Change Card Sort administration [Check all that apply]:  3, In person (ONLY if issues arise and hybrid) | 1=Yes; 0=No ([sched_delay] = '9' and [sched_hybrid] = '1') AND ([event-name] != '4_year_follow_up_y_arm_1')

neurocog_flanker___1.Description: Method of Flanker (in-person only) administration [Check all that apply]: 1, Audio | 1=Yes; 0=No [sched_hybrid] = '1'

neurocog_flanker___2.Description: Method of Flanker (in-person only) administration [Check all that apply]: 2, Video/Webcam | 1=Yes; 0=No [sched_hybrid] = '1'

neurocog_flanker___3.Description: Method of Flanker (in-person only) administration [Check all that apply]:  3, In person (REQUIRED) | 1=Yes; 0=No [sched_hybrid] = '1'

neurocog_intro_ipad_y.Description: Which iPAD model will you use? | 1=iPad Air II (otterbox defender series cover) ; 2=9.7'' iPad PRO (otterbox defender series cover) ; 4=9.7'' iPad (NON-Pro) (otterbox defender series cover) ; 5=10.2'' iPad (NON-Pro) (otterbox defender series cover) ; 3=Other iPad model or Model/cover combination [sched_delay] = '9' and [sched_hybrid] = '0'

Levels.1: iPad Air II (otterbox defender series cover)
Levels.3: Other iPad model or Model/cover combination

neurocog_intro2_ipad_y.Description: Which iPAD model will you use? | 1=iPad Air II (otterbox defender series cover) ; 2=9.7'' iPad PRO (otterbox defender series cover) ; 4=9.7'' iPad (NON-Pro) (otterbox defender series cover) ; 5=10.2'' iPad (NON-Pro) (otterbox defender series cover) ; 3=Other iPad model or Model/cover combination [sched_delay] = '7'

Levels.3: Other iPad model or Model/cover combination
